pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta Analysis of Factor Analysis Based on CO-Occurrence Matrices // Provide a series of functions to conduct a meta analysis of factor analysis based on co-occurrence matrices. The tool can be used to solve the factor structure (i.e. inner structure of a construct, or scale) debate in several disciplines, such as psychology, psychiatry, management, education so on. References: Shafer (2005) doi:10.1037/1040-3590.17.3.324; Shafer (2006) doi:10.1002/jclp.20213; Loeber and Schmaling (1985) doi:10.1007/BF00910652.
